Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
dropsend::data::AbstractEntityFactory"Abstract Factory" design pattern implementatin for using with server services and local cache. Or 2 versions of API at simultaneously. To get factory's instance you should use getDAOFactory method. Type of factory's realization is specified by integer constant:
dropsend::data::entities::AccountContains information about user's account. Data model class. Inherited from EntityWithId
dropsend::data::entities::ClientContains all inforamtion about user: users info, account, plan, user's files etc. Use like facade which provides user's data. !TODO: lazy loading
dropsend::debug::DebugHelperDebugHelper is used for display of results of test requests to server
dropsend::DropSendServiceDropsend server's API facade, which is used to get or set client's info
dropsend::data::EntityWithIdBase class for all entities. Any class which is used in DAO pattern must be inherited from this. Has server's ID
dropsend::data::FileBase class which contains information about user's files. By default, all user's files has filename, extension and path
dropsend::data::FileWithSenderBase class for file entities used by server. It is inherited by SentFile and ReceivedFile
dropsend::data::dao::IAccountDAO
dropsend::data::dao::IEntityDAO< T >Contains methods to obtain information about user's account. Inherited from IEntityDAO
dropsend::data::dao::IPlanDAOContains methods to obtain information about user's plan. Inherited from IEntityDAO
dropsend::data::dao::IReceivedFileDAOContains methods to obtain information about user's received files. Inherited from IUserRelatedDAO
dropsend::data::dao::ISentFileDAOContains methods to obtain information about user's sent files. Inherited from IUserRelatedDAO
dropsend::data::dao::IUserDAOUser's objects's DAO interface. Provides functionality to obtain user's info data model. Inherited from IEntityDAO
dropsend::data::dao::IUserRelatedDAO< T >Interface for objects(data model classes) which related to user. Some data model objects like SentFile, Account etc. are related to User. For their reception it is possible to use a method in which parameter is user ID. Inherited from IEntityDAO
dropsend::data::entities::PlanContains info about user's payment plan. Data model class
dropsend::data::entities::ReceivedFileContains info about user's received files. Data model class. Inherited from FileWithSender
dropsend::data::dao::remoteserver::RemoteServerAccountDAODAO which is used to obtain information from remote service. Contains API requests. Implements IAccountDAO
dropsend::data::dao::remoteserver::RemoteServerEntityFactoryFactory which is used to obtain information from remote service. Inherited from AbstractEntityFactory
dropsend::data::dao::remoteserver::RemoteServerPlanDAODAO which is used to obtain information from remote service. Contains API requests. Implements IPlanDAO
dropsend::data::dao::remoteserver::RemoteServerReceivedFileDAODAO which is used to obtain information from remote service. Contains API requests. Implements IReceivedFileDAO
dropsend::data::dao::remoteserver::RemoteServerSentFileDAODAO which is used to obtain information from remote service. Contains API requests. Implements ISentFileDAO
dropsend::data::dao::remoteserver::RemoteServerUserDAODAO which is used to obtain information from remote service. Contains API requests. Implements IUserDAO
dropsend::data::entities::SentFileContains info about user's sent files. Has recipient ID. Data model class. Inherited from FileWithSender
dropsend::utils::Singleton< T >Implementation of singleton design pattern
dropsend::data::entities::UserContains information about user. Service default user's model. Data model class
